McDonalds 7 reviews Rating Details Category: Restaurants Fast Food Fast Food [Edit] 931 W Sepulveda Blvd Torrance , CA 90502 Neighborhood: Harbor City (310) 539-3102 http://www.mcdonalds.com Menu Add Photos Price Range: $ Accepts Credit Cards: Yes Attire: Casual Good for Groups: Yes Good for Kids: Yes Takes Reservations: No Delivery: No Take-out: Yes Waiter Service: No Outdoor Seating: No Wi-Fi: Free Alcohol: No Drive-Thru: Yes Noise Level: Very Loud Has TV: Yes Caters: No First to Review Kelly W. From Reviewers You're Following
Reviews from Your Friends
7 reviews in English
Review from lauren g.
3 friends 41 reviews
lauren g.
Torrance, CA 6/21/2011 I graded this based on the atmosphere of the mcdonalds rather than the food- because as we know, the food isn't very different across most mcdonalds.
going on that, i would say that the interior design of this place was impressive for a fast food restaurant. it is unlike most mcdonalds because i can tell someone came in to design the place. It gives you almost a Starbucks feel with the mocha colors and unique seating arrangements.
of course the food is pretty decent considering its a major fast food chain, but I would recommend coming inside this particular location to be pleasantly surprised at the environment and set up here:)
Was this review…?
Useful Funny Cool
Add owner comment Bookmark Send to a Friend Link to This Review
Review from Christopher O.
22 friends 14 reviews
Christopher O.
Carson, CA 11/13/2011 This place gets 1 star due to one of the employee's bad attitude.
This incident didn't happen to me. One of the guys in front of me did not get a receipt after he ordered. When he realized it, he asked the cashier (young, thin girl with light brown hair) for a copy of the receipt to know when they call his order number. This order number is only printed on the receipt. Anywho, some how the worker misunderstood him and started going off on him in front of all the other customers. I guess she'd ditch school often, because even I understood him. Maybe she has a hearing problem or was on her rag?
Whatever the case, this 1 employee made that entire mcdonald's look ghetto. The mcgridle was ok btw.
Was this review…?
Useful Funny (1) Cool
Add owner comment Bookmark Send to a Friend Link to This Review
Review from Angel B.
6 friends 32 reviews
Angel B.
Los Angeles, CA 12/10/2011 1 Check-in Here Pretty fast service. Oatmeal sucked...and one of the staff actually walked across the drive thru to get to her car...I'm a very careful driver and I almost hit here. They could use sum safety training here and a large dose of common sense.
Was this review…?
Useful Funny Cool
Add owner comment Bookmark Send to a Friend Link to This Review
Review from Kelly W.
Elite '12 324 friends 375 reviews
Kelly W.
Hawthorne, CA 3/30/2010 How can a Mc Donalds get a five star rating? Because they are so CONSISTENTLY good time after time. I stop here Sunday morning on the way to work and at least once a week I stop by here to pick up dinner for me and my co-workers.
They have the BEST little sausage burritos of all the Mc Donalds I have ever been to. And the hashbrowns are nice crunchy...not soggy and greasy like they are at most other locations. The service is always quick and friendly. The inside is always clean. I just love this Mc Donalds!
I have has the occasional missed item in my bag or a missing sauce here and there but over all this is the best fast food place around!
Was this review…?
Useful (2) Funny Cool
Add owner comment Bookmark Send to a Friend Link to This Review
Review from gabe P.
28 friends 16 reviews
gabe P.
Carson, CA 3/14/2011 5 Check-ins Here I gave this place 3 stars simply for the fact that is McDonalds. Not based on the service or the quality of the food. As a matter of fact, this place has some of the fastest service and friendliest staff. And the food is as good as McDonalds can get. A will give McDonalds props for bringing back the beloved cherry pies and for the McCaffes.
Was this review…?
Useful Funny (1) Cool
Add owner comment Bookmark Send to a Friend Link to This Review
Review from Daniel C.
125 friends 453 reviews
Daniel C.
Los Angeles, CA 10/4/2010 I went in for an Iced Latte which was great by the way, but my review is for one of the chicks that was working there yesterday afternoon. Damn was she hot. Did I mention that the Iced Latte was great.
Was this review…?

Review from Rob A.
Elite '12 263 friends 390 reviews
Rob A.
Torrance, CA 6/20/2010 92 Check-ins Here This location is always nice and clean. But then again, McD's seems to do a good job of keeping there resturants clean. It's smaller than others but there's always a place to sit. The crew works quick and they have the system down. I only find they can sometimes mess up a breakfast order so always check before you leave.
